title: Evolutionary Educational Psychology-Based Learning Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational psychology and pedagogy concepts
context.additional_context: Focus on exploring the relationship between learners' digital device usage, social interaction, and academic achievement, and developing field-applicable educational strategies

learning_goals: Learners can explain differences in cognitive processes between language acquisition and math learning from an evolutionary perspective.
Learners can analyze evolutionary mechanisms that perpetuate social behaviors (e.g., bullying) in school environments.
Learners can design educational strategies to make self-concept more influential than physical traits on academic achievement.

resources: Digital Tools for Learning Data Analysis

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
